system.description: The character is a skilled grappler who can use technique to overcome stronger opponents.
system.benefit: Character can use Athletics Skill in place of Strength Characteristic for any Strength Tests made as part of a Grapple. When successfully using the Damage Opponent Grapple Option, they deal additional Damage equal to the number of Degrees of Success by which they won the Opposed Test.

specialAbilities.name: Grappling Mastery
specialAbilities.description: Use Athletics instead of Strength for grapple tests. When damaging grappled opponent, add extra damage equal to your Degrees of Success.
